description: A large woman wielding a large knife is depicted in a doorway, casting a menacing shadow, while three anthropomorphic mice watch from the side. This surreal scene presents an absurd escalation of the classic nursery rhyme scenario involving the farmer's wife and mice. The mice's fearful reaction contrasts with their typical depiction, highlighting the exaggerated and darkly humorous nature of the woman's rage. The presence of the cuckoo clock adds a domestic, yet perhaps unsettling, detail to the unusual conflict. The situation is a darkly comedic subversion of expectations.
caption: “Egad! ... Sounds like the farmer's wife has really flipped out this time!”
